detail_desc: Short T-shirt dress in a viscose weave with a round neckline, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Long, multi-strand necklace with pendants. Adjustable length, 81-120 cm.

Blouse in an airy weave with a small stand-up collar, V-neck, button placket and chest pocket. Gathered yoke at the shoulders and back, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Socks in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Ankle-length jumpsuit in soft, marled viscose and linen jersey with narrow shoulder straps, a small V-neck and wide, straight legs.
V-neck T-shirt in cotton jersey with a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Chinos in washed stretch cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly, side pockets, a fake coin pocket, fake back pockets and slim legs.

Dungaree shorts in washed stretch denim with adjustable straps with metal fasteners, a pocket at the top, heart-shaped front pockets and regular back pockets. Buttons at the sides and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline.
Knee-length jersey skirt with an elasticated waist and elastic down the sides for a draped effect. Lined.

Parka in a sturdy weave with a drawstring hood with a fleece lining at the front. Zip and wind flap with a hook-and-loop fastening at the front, handwarmer pockets and patch pockets with a flap and hook-and-loop fastening. Adjustable tab with a hook-and-loop fastening at the cuffs and sides and a drawstring at the hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Briefs in an airy silk blend with lace sections, an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Necklace of thin metal chains, two of which have a pendant. Adjustable length 42-49 cm.
Tights in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with a shaft that finishes at the knee.

Longer blouse in lightweight, softly draping satin with a sheen. Small, gathered stand-up collar, a V-shaped opening at the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Wide, satin-covered Alice band.
Knee-length, pleated skirt in a jacquard weave with a high waist and sewn-in wrapover at the front with an asymmetric hem. Concealed zip and button in one side. Unlined.
Short-sleeved sports tops in fast-drying functional fabric.
Hipster briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Padded gilet with a detachable hood and zip down the front with a chin guard. Lined.
Wide, V-neck jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Short dressing gown in soft jersey made from a viscose blend with long sleeves and a detachable tie belt at the waist.

5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and skinny legs. Shaping – denim with a stretch function that holds in and shapes the waist, thighs and bum while keeping the jeans in shape.
Long earrings with metal and plastic rings. Length 8 cm.
Jumper in soft, textured-knit cotton with long puff sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Sleeveless blouse in an airy weave with a V-neck opening and ties at the neckline. Pleated stand-up collar and a pleated trim around the armholes. Lined.
Shorter, fitted top in ribbed cotton jersey with a deep neckline and short sleeves.
Captain’s cap with a band at the front. Lined.
Fitted top in soft organic cotton jersey with 3/4-length sleeves and gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy.
Shorts in soft viscose twill with a small, embroidered heart in glittery thread on one leg. Elasticated waist with a small frill trim and decorative bow, and patch front pockets.

Blouse in an airy cotton weave with an embroidered pattern, inset lace trims at the front and a grandad collar. Opening at the top with twisted, tasselled ties and long raglan sleeves with a slight puff at the shoulders and covered elastication at the cuffs.
T-shirts in soft cotton jersey with narrow ribbing around the neckline. Three printed and two in a solid colour.
Sleeveless dress in organic cotton jersey with a seam at the waist and bell-shaped skirt. Unlined.
Scarf in soft, gently draping cashmere with fringes along the short sides. Size 32x170 cm.
Shorts in woven fabric with a high paper bag waist, pleats at the top, a detachable tie belt, and lace trims at the hems.
Straight-cut, double-breasted jacket in wide-wale cotton corduroy with notch lapels, welt front pockets with a flap, and decorative buttons at the cuffs. Lined.
Suit trousers in woven fabric with a zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fastener. Side pockets, fake welt pockets at the back and tapered legs with creases.
Oversized top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a ribbed polo neck, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem, and slits in the sides. Soft brushed inside.

Lightly padded jacket in a patterned weave with a stand-up collar and detachable, satin-lined hood. Zip down the front, long sleeves with contrasting colour stripes down the sides, and elastication around the hood, cuffs and hem. Lined.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a round neckline with a narrow ribbed trim.
Short, sleeveless A-line dress in soft viscose jersey.
Striped top in soft organic cotton jersey with a round neck and long sleeves.

Set with a pair of ballet shoes and a hairband. Ballet shoes in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise, an elastic strap over the foot and a lace trim at the front. Jersey lining and soft soles. Elastic hairband with fabric flowers.

Block-coloured, padded jacket in woven fabric with a slight sheen. Short, wide fit with a padded stand-up collar, zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front, dropped shoulders and side pockets. Lined.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a print motif and reversible sequins. Slightly wider neckline, long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Straight-cut V-neck dress in a crêpe weave. Small stand-up collar, pleats at the front and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.

Push-up bra in lace and mesh with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.

Fleece-lined jacket in windproof, water-repellent, breathable functional fabric with a detachable, jersey-lined hood and stand-up collar. Zip and wind flap with a hook and loop fastening down the front, a zipped chest pocket and flap front pockets with a hook and loop fastening. Adjustable tab and elastication at the cuffs, folded seams and reflective details. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Wide top in sweatshirt fabric with a stand-up collar, zip at the top, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Leather belt with a round metal buckle. Width 2.8 cm.
Top in soft viscose jersey with lace over the shoulders and a rounded hem.
Thin tights in soft microfibre with an elasticated waist.
Sandals with narrow foot straps and a heel strap with covered elastication. Imitation leather insoles. Heel 1 cm.
Top in soft fabric with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Sports vest top in fast-drying, ribbed jersey with a racer back.
Long-sleeved jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with a sequin motif on the front, slits in the sides and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Top in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Three-strand thin metal chain necklace with pendants. Adjustable length, 32-40 cm.
Straight dress in patterned sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Long raglan sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups at the cuffs, and a braided imitation suede belt with a metal buckle.
Lace hipster briefs with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Cotton canvas trainers with concealed elastication at the top. Fabric linings and insoles, rubber soles.
Blouse in a crinkled viscose weave with a V-neck, short dolman sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a gently rounded hem. Wide fit, longer at the back.
Vest top in airy Tencel™ lyocell jersey with a low neckline front and back.
Joggers in velour with an elasticated drawstring waist and tapered legs with ribbed jersey hems.
Knee-length shorts in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, slightly lower crotch, side pockets and a back pocket.
Dungarees in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details. Adjustable straps, a zip at the side, a chest pocket, side pockets, coin pocket, back pockets and slim legs.
Top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a jersey-lined drawstring hood, long raglan sleeves and a kangaroo pocket. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Short dress in a patterned crêpe weave with a round neckline, an opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck and 3/4-length, flounced sleeves. Unlined.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed, stretch, flexible cotton denim for maximum comfort with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button and wide legs.
Short-sleeved wrapover blouse in linen with a deep V-neck and buttons at the front, adjustable safety buttons at one side and ties at the other. Seam at the waist and a peplum.
Sleeveless lace dress with an opening and button at the back of the neck and an elasticated waist. Cotton jersey lining.
Socks in a soft, fine knit containing some wool and glittery threads.

Set with a long-sleeved wrapover bodysuit, pair of leggings and hat in soft, ribbed organic cotton jersey. Bodysuit with press-studs at the sides and crotch. Leggings with wide, foldover ribbing at the waist. Hat with a foldover hem.

Shirt in an airy linen and cotton blend with a turn-down collar, classic front and yoke at the back. Open chest pocket, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Double-layered triangular scarves in soft cotton jersey with an adjustable press-stud fastening at the back of the neck.
Set with a vest top and pair of shorts in soft cotton jersey. Vest top with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder. Shorts with an elasticated waist and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Straight-cut dress in soft, patterned cotton jersey with a round neckline, short sleeves and a flounce-trimmed yoke at the front.
Elasticated scrunchie in woven fabric.
Hipster briefs in microfibre with lace trims, a low waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.
